text: Natsagiin Bagabandi (; born April 22, 1950) is a Mongolian politician. He is the Director of Oyu Tolgoi LLC. He was the 2nd President of Mongolia from 1997 to 2005. He is a member of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party.http://www.mofa.go.jp.ext.saariselka.ru.ext.saariselka.ru/announce/event/1998/5/0284-18.html ==References== Category:Presidents of Mongolia Category:1950 births Category:Living people
title: Natsagiin Bagabandi
